about.details:
Incorporated in 1985, Veekayem Fashion and Apparels Limited is engaged in the business of weaving and garment manufacturing. The company's product portfolio includes two main product categories: Textile the company manufactures Greige Fabrics including 100% Cotton - Lycra and Non-Lycra, Giza, Supima, Blended Cotton Suiting - Chief Value Cotton, Polyester Cotton, 100% Cotton Yarn Dyed, Polyester Viscose, Terry Rayon Suiting and Mock Linen and Garments the company manufacture all types of readymade garments for men and women, such as formal shirts, cotton shirts, formal trousers, cotton trousers, cotton joggers, cotton shorts, pyjamas and Bermuda.

Veekayem Fashion's manufacturing facility is situated at Umargaon in the state of Gujarat. The manufacturing facility is installed with automated machinery capable of manufacturing 5,00,000 meters of fabric per month and 1,50,000 pcs of readymade garments per month.

Competitive Strength:

  • Consistency in Quality and Service Standards.
  • Scalable Business Model.
  • Product mix and Market mix.
  • Cost-effective production and timely fulfilment of orders.
  • Experienced management and dedicated employee base.
  • Wide sales and distribution network.

faqs.question: What is the Veekayem Fashion and Apparels IPO?
faqs.answer:
Veekayem Fashion and Apparels IPO is a SME IPO of 1584000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹4.44 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹28 per share. The minimum order quantity is 4000.

The IPO opens on August 5, 2022, and closes on August 11, 2022.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Veekayem Fashion and Apparels IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Veekayem Fashion and Apparels IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Veekayem Fashion and Apparels IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Veekayem Fashion and Apparels IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Veekayem Fashion and Apparels IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Veekayem Fashion and Apparels IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Veekayem Fashion and Apparels IPO opens on August 5, 2022 and closes on August 11, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Veekayem Fashion and Apparels IPO?
faqs.answer: Veekayem Fashion and Apparels IPO lot size is 4000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,12,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Veekayem Fashion and Apparels IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Veekayem Fashion and Apparels IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Veekayem Fashion and Apparels IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Veekayem Fashion and Apparels IPO will be done on Wednesday, August 17, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Friday, August 19, 2022. Check the Veekayem Fashion and Apparels IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Veekayem Fashion and Apparels IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Veekayem Fashion and Apparels IPO listing date is on Monday, August 22, 2022.
